column1: 0,Name the first 3 people born before 1970 who produced a movie released after 2000.,"MATCH (p:Person)-[:PRODUCED]->(m:Movie)

column2: 1,Which movies released between 2005 and 2010 have the tagline 'Speed has no limits'?,MATCH (m:Movie)

column1: WHERE m.released >= 2005 AND m.released <= 2010 AND m.tagline = 'Speed has no limits'
$m isa movie, has released $r, has tagline ""Speed has no limits""

column2: 2,Who are the top 3 people born after 1960 who have directed a movie titled 'V for Vendetta'?,MATCH (p:Person)-[:DIRECTED]->(m:Movie {title: 'V for Vendetta'})

column1: $p isa person, has name $name, has born $born
$m isa movie, has title ""V for Vendetta""

column2: 3,Which top 3 movies have been both produced and reviewed by the same person?,MATCH (p:Person)-[:PRODUCED]->(m:Movie)<-[:REVIEWED]-(p)
4,Name the first 3 people who have reviewed a movie with a summary stating 'Silly, but fun'.","MATCH (p:Person)-[r:REVIEWED]->(m:Movie)
5,List the top 5 movies with a tagline mentioning 'compelling' and having more than 50 votes.,MATCH (m:Movie)

column1: $m isa movie, has tagline $tl, has votes $v

column2: 6,Who are the top 3 persons who have both directed and produced the same movie?,MATCH (p:Person)-[:DIRECTED]->(m:Movie)<-[:PRODUCED]-(p)
7,List the first 3 movies directed by persons who were born after 1950 and before 1960.,MATCH (p:Person)-[:DIRECTED]->(m:Movie)

column1: RETURN m.title AS MovieTitle, m.released AS ReleaseYear

column2: 8,What are the names of the top 5 people who acted in and also reviewed the same movie?,MATCH (p:Person)-[:ACTED_IN]->(m:Movie)<-[:REVIEWED]-(p)
9,List the first 5 movies that have been acted in by someone with the role 'Captain' and reviewed with a rating below 60.,MATCH (p:Person)-[:ACTED_IN]->(m:Movie)
10,List the first 3 movies with a tagline containing the word 'real' and released before 2000.,MATCH (m:Movie)

column1: $m isa movie, has tagline $tl, has released $r

column2: 12,What are the highest-rated reviews and which movies do they belong to?,MATCH (p:Person)-[r:REVIEWED]->(m:Movie)

column1: RETURN m.title AS movie, r.summary AS review_summary, r.rating AS rating","match

column2: 13,List all the movies reviewed with a rating above 80.,MATCH (p:Person)-[r:REVIEWED]->(m:Movie)

column1: RETURN m.title AS MovieTitle, r.rating AS Rating","match

column2: 14,Who has reviewed 'Speed Racer' and what was their rating?,MATCH (p:Person)-[r:REVIEWED]->(m:Movie {title: 'Speed Racer'})

column1: RETURN p.name AS reviewer, r.rating AS rating","match

column2: 15,Find all the people who follow Keanu Reeves.,MATCH (keanu:Person {name: ""Keanu Reeves""})<-[:FOLLOWS]-(follower:Person)
16,Who are the top 5 oldest actors in the database?,MATCH (p:Person)-[:ACTED_IN]->(m:Movie)

column1: RETURN p.name AS actor, p.born AS birthYear
$p isa person, has name $name, has born $b

column2: 17,List all the movies reviewed with the summary 'An amazing journey'.,MATCH (:Person)-[r:REVIEWED]->(m:Movie)
18,Which person wrote the most movies?,MATCH (p:Person)-[:WROTE]->(m:Movie)
19,Who produced the most movies released after 2000?,MATCH (p:Person)-[:PRODUCED]->(m:Movie)
20,List all movies with a release year in the 1980s.,MATCH (m:Movie)
21,Who directed 'Speed Racer'?,MATCH (p:Person)-[:DIRECTED]->(m:Movie {title: 'Speed Racer'})
22,Find all actors born in the 1960s.,MATCH (p:Person)-[:ACTED_IN]->(m:Movie)

column1: RETURN p.name AS actor_name, p.born AS birth_year","match
$p isa person, has name $name, has born $b

column2: 23,Who reviewed the most movies?,MATCH (p:Person)-[r:REVIEWED]->(m:Movie)

column1: RETURN p.name AS reviewer, COUNT(r) AS review_count

column2: 24,List top 3 people who have directed, produced, and acted in the same movie.","MATCH (p:Person)-[:DIRECTED]->(m:Movie)
25,Find movies with fewer than 50 votes.,MATCH (m:Movie)
26,Which movies were produced by Joel Silver?,MATCH (p:Person {name: ""Joel Silver""})-[:PRODUCED]->(m:Movie)
27,Who has the highest number of follows among persons?,MATCH (p:Person)-[:FOLLOWS]->(f:Person)

column1: RETURN f.name AS person, COUNT(p) AS followers

column2: 28,List movies with a tagline that includes the word 'world'.,MATCH (m:Movie)
29,List the first 5 people who wrote a movie with a rating of at least 80 in a review.,MATCH (p:Person)-[:WROTE]->(m:Movie)<-[:REVIEWED]-(r:Person)
30,List the first 3 movies with a tagline containing 'limits' and released after 2005.,MATCH (m:Movie)

column1: $m isa movie, has tagline $tl, has released $r

column2: 31,What are the names of the top 5 people who have followed more than three other persons?,MATCH (p:Person)-[:FOLLOWS]->(other:Person)
32,List the top 5 persons who reviewed movies with a summary stating 'An amazing journey' and a rating above 80.,MATCH (p:Person)-[r:REVIEWED]->(m:Movie)

column1: WHERE r.summary = 'An amazing journey' AND r.rating > 80
$r isa reviewed (reviewer: $p, film: $m), has summary ""An amazing journey"", has rating $rat

column2: 33,Who are the top 3 people who have acted in at least two movies with more than 100 votes each?,MATCH (p:Person)-[r:ACTED_IN]->(m:Movie)

column1: WITH p, COUNT(DISTINCT m) AS movieCount

column2: 34,List the first 5 movies where the tagline includes the word 'Houston' and the released year is before 2000.,MATCH (m:Movie)

column1: $m isa movie, has tagline $tg, has released $r

column2: 35,Name the first 3 people born before 1950 who have written a movie with a tagline mentioning 'journey'.,MATCH (p:Person)-[:WROTE]->(m:Movie)

column1: $p isa person, has born $b, has name $n

column2: 36,Which top 5 movies released between 1980 and 1990 have been reviewed with a summary mentioning 'compelling'?,MATCH (m:Movie)-[:REVIEWED]->(r:REVIEWED)

column1: WHERE m.released >= 1980 AND m.released <= 1990 AND r.summary CONTAINS 'compelling'
RETURN m.title, m.released, COUNT(r) AS review_count
$m isa movie, has released $rel, has title $t

column2: 37,List the first 3 persons who have produced a movie with a tagline including 'real world' and released after 1995.,MATCH (p:Person)-[:PRODUCED]->(m:Movie)

column1: WHERE m.tagline CONTAINS 'real world' AND m.released > 1995
$m isa movie, has tagline $t, has released $r

column2: 38,Who are the top 3 directors of movies that have been reviewed with a summary stating 'Pretty funny at times'?,MATCH (p:Person)-[:DIRECTED]->(m:Movie)<-[:REVIEWED]-(r:Person)

column1: RETURN p.name AS Director, COUNT(m) AS MovieCount

column2: 39,List the top 5 movies that have been directed by someone born in 1967.,MATCH (director:Person)-[:DIRECTED]->(movie:Movie)

column1: RETURN movie.title AS title, movie.released AS released

column2: 40,Name the first 3 people who have reviewed a movie with a tagline stating 'Welcome to the Real World'.,MATCH (p:Person)-[:REVIEWED]->(m:Movie {tagline: 'Welcome to the Real World'})

column1: $m isa movie, has tagline ""Welcome to the Real World""

column2: 41,Which movies have more than 1000 votes?,MATCH (m:Movie)
42,List all movies released after 2000.,MATCH (m:Movie)
43,Who acted in 'The Matrix'?,MATCH (p:Person)-[:ACTED_IN]->(m:Movie {title: 'The Matrix'})
44,Find all directors of movies released before 1990.,MATCH (p:Person)-[:DIRECTED]->(m:Movie)

column1: RETURN p.name AS Director, m.title AS MovieTitle, m.released AS ReleaseYear","match

column2: 45,Which persons have a birth year after 1950?,MATCH (p:Person)
46,How many movies has Keanu Reeves acted in?,MATCH (p:Person {name: ""Keanu Reeves""})-[:ACTED_IN]->(m:Movie)
47,List all movies that were both acted in and directed by the same person.,MATCH (p:Person)-[:ACTED_IN]->(m:Movie)<-[:DIRECTED]-(p)
